keyMoments.title: Learns of CP9's Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers that CP9 plans to kill the Straw Hats despite her sacrifice, as they violated the agreement by coming to Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Robin realizes her sacrifice was meaningless and that the World Government never intended to honor their agreement.

keyMoments.title: Beaten by Spandam
keyMoments.description: After questioning Spandam's authority over the Buster Call, Robin is violently beaten by him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's helpless situation and Spandam's cruelty, while triggering traumatic memories.

keyMoments.title: Brief Ohara Flashback
keyMoments.description: Robin experiences a brief flashback to the Ohara incident when reminded of the Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's ongoing trauma from the destruction of Ohara and sets up the full flashback arc.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Loophole in Agreement
keyMoments.description: Lucci explains to Robin that the agreement allowed the Straw Hats to leave Water 7 safely, but their arrival at Enies Lobby means CP9 can now kill them.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lucci's cold logic and the World Government's duplicity.
keyMoments.quote: The terms of the arrangement were that, excluding Nico Robin, the Straw Hat Pirates would be allowed to leave Water 7 safely.

keyMoments.title: Reveals His True Nature
keyMoments.description: When asked what he wants, Lucci reveals he desires government-sanctioned killing and has no interest in status or authority beyond the freedom to murder with impunity.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lucci as a psychopath who uses his position for personal bloodlust rather than justice.
keyMoments.quote: Our Justice exists in the World Government. We want blood, and we have the right to kill people because we are with the Government.

reveals.information: Lucci's true motivation is government-sanctioned killing, not justice or duty

keyMoments.title: Fights Through Marines
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles his way through waves of Marines at Enies Lobby, showing improved combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth and determination to reach Robin.

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Blueno
keyMoments.description: Luffy reaches the courthouse roof where Blueno has been waiting for him, setting up their rematch.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the crucial battle where Luffy will debut Gear Second.

keyMoments.title: Beats Robin
keyMoments.description: Spandam violently beats Robin when she questions his authority over the Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Spandam's insecurity, cruelty, and cowardice.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Luffy at Courthouse
keyMoments.description: Blueno waits for Luffy at the courthouse and confronts him on the roof.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the rematch between Blueno and Luffy where Luffy will showcase his growth.
keyMoments.quote: You made it this far. This is the first time anyone has gotten past the entrance.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Door-Door Fruit
keyMoments.description: Blueno shows his ability to create doors in the air using the Doa Doa no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Reminds viewers of Blueno's Devil Fruit powers.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Translates Sodom and Gomorrah's Story
keyMoments.description: Chopper uses his ability to communicate with animals to translate the King Bulls' backstory for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's unique ability and provides backstory for Sodom and Gomorrah.

keyMoments.title: Notices Sogeking Missing
keyMoments.description: Chopper realizes that Sogeking is no longer with the group.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Sogeking's independent actions during the assault.

keyMoments.title: Origin Story Revealed
keyMoments.description: Through Chopper's translation, Sodom reveals how he and Gomorrah were saved from a Sea King's stomach by Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Provides backstory and motivation for Sodom and Gomorrah's loyalty to Franky.

reveals.information: Sodom and Gomorrah were saved from a Sea King's stomach by Franky and swore loyalty to him

keyMoments.title: Origin Story Revealed
keyMoments.description: Through Chopper's translation, Gomorrah's backstory with Franky is revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Provides backstory and motivation for Sodom and Gomorrah's loyalty to Franky.

reveals.information: Sodom and Gomorrah were saved from a Sea King's stomach by Franky and swore loyalty to him
